entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'him'. The lightning scar on his forehead is a notable feature.

entities.name: lightning scar
entities.description: A scar on Harry's forehead that has not pained him for nineteen years. It is mentioned as a notable feature of his appearance.

relationships.description: Harry has the lightning scar on his forehead, which is a notable feature of his appearance. This relationship is described as Harry touching the scar absentmindedly.
